org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.ops.executioner.kernels.args

Interface KernelCallPointerArgs

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumulationKernelCallPointerArgs, BaseKernelCallPointerArgs, BroadcastKernelCallPointerArgs, CollapseAccumulationKernelCallPointerArgs, IndexAccumulationKernelCallPointerArgs, PostProcessKernelCallPointerArgs, ScalarKernelCallPointerArgs, TransformKernelCallPointerArgs

    public interface KernelCallPointerArgs
    Wrapper class for different kinds of device pointers and operations. This is meant for the easy translation of and reuse of pointers across composing operations.
    Author:
    Adam Gibson
